abstract: Once 100,000 viewers have clicked on a Levi’s ad to pledge support for Water.org, Levi’s will make a donation to the organization.
snippet: Once 100,000 viewers have clicked on a Levi’s ad to pledge support for Water.org, Levi’s will make a donation to the organization.
lead_paragraph: Levi’s is adding a hue to its marketing efforts: Facebook blue. The purveyor of all things denim has teamed up with the social media giant on the next phase of its “Go Forth” campaign.

headline.main: Levi’s Drive for Water.org via Facebook
